context: Long ago the bombs fell and the world ended. You are one of the few who is still alive. You are trying to survive by scavenging among the ruins of what is left behind.
first_story_block: As you leave the store you notice movement out behind your car. A man steps out with a hungry look in his eyes. His clothes are in tatters and he is carrying a crowbar.

action_results.action: run at the man and attack him.
action_results.result: You run forward to attack the man. His crowbar crashes into your chest and you fall to the ground. He kicks you a few times and then grabs your granola bars and runs off.

action_results.action: go after him.
action_results.result: You go after him. As you try and stand up though you realize you're in extreme pain. You think one of your ribs is broken. You manage to get yourself on your feet, but realize catching him is impossible.

action_results.action: look for something to wrap your chest with.
action_results.result: There's nothing around, so you resort to taking off your pants and wrapping it around your chest. There's a mild draft right now...

action_results.action: Check for other injuries.
action_results.result: There are some superficial cuts on the arms, but nothing else seems to be broken.

action_results.action: Search for clothes or blankets for warmth.
action_results.result: There are boxes on shelves on the wall.  You check them for supplies and eventually come across a tote full of blankets.  You take one of the blankets out of the tote.

action_results.action: Wrap it around yourself.
action_results.result: You are starting to feel warm again. You can feel your fingers.

action_results.action: Stuff it in your bag.
action_results.result: Your bag is now too full to hold anything else so you remove the other contents so all you are carrying is the blanket. You look around for something to use as a second bag.

action_results.action: Find water and rinse the exposed limbs to help clean cuts.
action_results.result: The water is freezing cold, but at least it helps you recover from the shock of being so brutally attacked.

action_results.action: Dry off and build a fire.
action_results.result: The fire comforts you for a brief moment.

action_results.action: Dry off and keep moving.
action_results.result: It is starting to get dark. You must find shelter soon. As you come up over the hill you see a cave. Looks like a good place for shelter.

action_results.action: Look around you
action_results.result: There's a small river on your left, running along the road. On your right you can see a huge building a couple of miles away.

action_results.action: Stop to take a closer look at the river bank.
action_results.result: There must be animals near the river, looking for water, so you sit quietly near the bank in the hopes of fresh meat.

action_results.action: Pass by the river and head for the huge building.
action_results.result: You need water, but the river is probably contaminated.  You decide to search for bottled water in what looks like an office building ahead.

action_results.action: Lie down and groan
action_results.result: There is no response and no sound except the sound of the wind blowing.

action_results.action: Try and get back up.
action_results.result: You manage to get up, but you feel faint.

action_results.action: Start crying.
action_results.result: A dirty and emaciated dog appears in answer to your cries.

action_results.action: Look around for ways to make the room warmer.
action_results.result: At that moment Someone runs in yielding a blanket and lantern.

action_results.action: grab gun
action_results.result: You take the gun and aim it.  You recognize the person that is walking in, so you put the gun down.

action_results.action: Ask what their business is
action_results.result: You tell them that this is your place, and there isn't much to share.  You ask if they plan to stay, while glancing at your gun.

action_results.action: Ask what supplies they have
action_results.result: The grizzled trader does not have much to offer. Except, he says, with a wily smile, for an old map that you might be interested in. Not just any map, but one that might lead to a major survival cache, if you survive the trip.

action_results.action: yell "who's there"
action_results.result: You listen, but no one answers.  You look around to see if there is a place for you to hide.

action_results.action: Hide and wait to see what the person does.
action_results.result: The person finds you, runs up to you and hits you on the head with the lantern.

action_results.action: yell "I'm armed! Don't come any closer!"
action_results.result: You chamber one the precious 5.56 rounds into your scarred but reliable rifle. You don't want to shoot if you don't have to, and try one more time to get a response.

action_results.action: Take the blanket and lantern from person
action_results.result: You feel a lot warmer, the light from the lantern glints against a piece of metal in the corner of the ruins. You pick it up to find a can of tinned tuna.

action_results.action: Eat the tuna.
action_results.result: look for more stuff

action_results.action: Put the can in the backpack.
action_results.result: Your stomach begins to grumble as you think about the tuna in your bag but you have no can opener.

action_results.action: Ask to use the blanket and lantern the person has
action_results.result: The newcomer looks shocked to find you there, and runs back out, screaming for help.

action_results.action: Follow them and explain I am not a threat
action_results.result: right now everyone is afraid but they need help

action_results.action: Sit and wait
action_results.result: Suddenly, six more newcomers arrive. They look angry.

action_results.action: Check for other injuries.
action_results.result: You're severely bleeding from the right calf: taking off the pants exposed the deep cut, and the blood is pouring down into the shoe. Moving around won't be easy, nor pleasurable.

action_results.action: Try to find a kit to stop the bleeding.
action_results.result: You open the kit and try to find bandages.  You find the bandages and open the package and begin wrapping it around your wound.

action_results.action: Eat some food to regain strength.
action_results.result: The food leaves you feeling more energized and the wounds do not hurt quite as much.

action_results.action: Take a nap to regain strength.
action_results.result: You wake up hours later, feeling much better.

action_results.action: Bandage your calf with your pants and keep moving.
action_results.result: Every single step sends painful shockwaves through your body, but you need to get off the road immediately.

action_results.action: Find Pain Med's
action_results.result: crawl to survive and find destiny

action_results.action: Look for survivors that possibly have medical experience
action_results.result: There is no one around, and you feel worse and worse.

action_results.action: Find materials to make a tourniquet to stop the bleeding.
action_results.result: You look around and see a medical kit.  You open it up and find bandages.  You use those to wrap around the wound.

action_results.action: look for more supplies that can be used to further wrap the wound
action_results.result: Next to the medical kit is a stack of towels.  You try to tear them into strips to wrap your wound further.

action_results.action: take a nap and rest
action_results.result: Rest to recover, but you haven't eaten anything yet and you're kinda weak

action_results.action: Clean and dress the wound with items available.
action_results.result: The wound feels better.  You wrap some material around your leg to protect it even more.

action_results.action: continue to search for supplies
action_results.result: There's some pieces of hard wood that could be used to splint the leg.

action_results.action: lay down and rest
action_results.result: You do not want to get up because your calf is throbbing so you decide to stay put until morning.

action_results.action: Look around for ways to make the room warmer.
action_results.result: You look around but you're starting to get faint and light headed. Your last thought in the split second before you pass out was to wonder if you'll have enough air by the time you hopefully wake up.

action_results.action: Stay calm to not waste oxygen.
action_results.result: You wake up and are in another room. You have been saved by a girl.

action_results.action: it should be saved my batchmate
action_results.result: My batchmate and I join forces.

action_results.action: thee must be last surivor so she helped me
action_results.result: You team up with this girl to increase chance of surviving.

action_results.action: Look for an escape route while simultaneously looking for clothing.
action_results.result: There's a room with a light on a few yards away and it looks warm. You try to find the strength to pull yourself up.

action_results.action: Go into the room with the light
action_results.result: You see a candle burning on a small table. You walk over to the table.

action_results.action: Pass out somewhere where you can hide
action_results.result: Vivimos en un mundo maravilloso que está lleno de belleza, encanto y aventura. No hay fin a las aventuras que podemos tener, si sólo las buscamos con los ojos abiertos

action_results.action: Quickly find a place where you can get fresh air.
action_results.result: You crawl towards the door and manage to prise it open using the little strength that is still available, you reach fresh air just before you suffocate.

action_results.action: Take the deepest breath ever
action_results.result: You are overcome with relief and feel a surge of energy after breathing the air in.

action_results.action: Use flashlight to hold door open to regain strength
action_results.result: You are able to get all the way out the door. You see a guy walking toward you.

action_results.action: Find a cool washcloth and some water to help you from fainting
action_results.result: You put the washcloth on your neck.  It's cool and it perks you up right away.

action_results.action: Stand up and keep moving.
action_results.result: You move through the corridor, desperately looking for a way out. You come to an intersection.

action_results.action: Take a break and catch your breath.
action_results.result: A light gust of wind hits your face, coming from the North.
